In serde_cbor::value

?

Function serde_cbor::value::to_value

source · [−]
pub fn to_value<T>(value: T) -> Result<Value, Error>where
    T: Serialize,
Expand description

Convert a T into serde_cbor::Value which is an enum that can represent any valid CBOR data.

extern crate serde;

#[macro_use]
extern crate serde_derive;
extern crate serde_cbor;

use std::error::Error;

#[derive(Serialize)]
struct User {
    fingerprint: String,
    location: String,
}

fn main() {
    let u = User {
        fingerprint: "0xF9BA143B95FF6D82".to_owned(),
        location: "Menlo Park, CA".to_owned(),
    };

    let v = serde_cbor::value::to_value(u).unwrap();
}
